title: Smiling Proud Wanderer - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Game   Adapted to Manhua   Adapted to Movie   Ancient China   Androgynous Characters   Betrayal   Classic   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Evil Religions   First Love   Late Romance   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Misunderstandings   Politics   Revenge   Schemes And Conspiracies   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Unique Cultivation Technique   Younger Love Interests
author: Jin Yong
description: The story is about friendship and love, deception and betrayal, ambition and lust for power. In the middle of it all is, Linghu Chong, an orphan who is the senior student of Yue Buqun, leader of Huashan Sect, and the protagonist of the story. The story deals with his journey and development as a swordsman and his witness to the various intrigues which take place in the martial world of the story.>
